video.name: VEGAN GLUTEN-FREE PUMPKIN BARS - No Oil, Grainfree | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
These Vegan Gluten-free Pumpkin Bars are grain-free, fudgy and so Delicious! No Oil.
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/10/vegan-gluten-free-pumpkin-bars-grainfree.html

These Pumpkin Bars are all things fall. Loaded with pumpkin, pumpkin pie spices, are fudgy, moist and great to snack on or for dessert. These are like pumpkin pie bars but with a bit of volume and texture. Smooth, hearty and So Fudgy!

Pumpkin puree and maple mixed with almond flour and coconut flour and topped with an easy cinnamon streusel. No flour in these bars. They are grain and gluten free, have no added oil and can be made without refined sugar. Wondering how all that works out? make them to know!

recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp coconut sugar or other sugar for sweeter (, optional)
1 tbsp potato starch (or other starch such as tapioca or corn)
2.5 tbsp brown sugar (or use coconut sugar)
2 tbsp almond flour or a combination of almond and coconut flours

recipeInstructions.text: Line a loaf pan (9 by 5 inch. Keep some parchment hanging over the side so that you can pick the baked bars out of the pan without overturning). Preheat the oven to 350 deg F ((180 C).Mix all the ingredients under wet until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a loaf pan (9 by 5 inch. Keep some parchment hanging over the side so that you can pick the baked bars out of the pan without overturning). Preheat the oven to 350 deg F ((180 C).Mix all the ingredients under wet until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl and add to the wet, Combine to make a thick batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl and add to the wet, Combine to make a thick batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the batter into a parchment lined loaf pan and even it out using a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the batter into a parchment lined loaf pan and even it out using a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the streusel ingredients. Add about 1 tsp or so maple syrup, or almond butter or pumpkin puree to moisten it to make crumbs if the brown sugar isn't moist enough.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the streusel ingredients. Add about 1 tsp or so maple syrup, or almond butter or pumpkin puree to moisten it to make crumbs if the brown sugar isn't moist enough.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread on top. Bake for 30 to 35 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread on top. Bake for 30 to 35 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 10 mins in the pan. Then remove from the pan by lifting up the hanging parchment, cool completely, slice and chill for an hour or so before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 10 mins in the pan. Then remove from the pan by lifting up the hanging parchment, cool completely, slice and chill for an hour or so before serving.
